name: skilion-onedrive
description:
A complete tool to interact with OneDrive on Linux, developed by
Skilion, following the UNIX philosophy.

dependencies.name: dmd
dependencies.description: DMD is the reference compiler for the D programming language.

dependencies.name: curl
dependencies.description:
cURL is an open source command line tool and library for transferring
data with URL syntax

dependencies.name: sqlite
dependencies.description:
SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-
contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.
